name: Emergence
description: A bold, handcrafted bronze sculpture celebrating the transformative journey of queer identity. Meticulously cast and finished, 'Emergence' embodies resilience and self-discovery.

name: Fluidity
description: A striking sculpture crafted from recycled steel that reflects the ever-changing nature of identity. 'Fluidity' captures the beauty of transformation with dynamic forms.

name: Radiance
description: This piece, titled 'Radiance', embodies the spirit of true self-expression. Crafted from sustainably sourced wood paired with resin, it evokes a sense of inner light and authenticity.

name: Resilience
description: An inspiring piece titled 'Resilience' that symbolizes strength and perseverance. Crafted from an eclectic mix of materials, it celebrates the beauty of overcoming adversity and standing true to oneself.

name: Luminescence
description: 'Luminescence' captures the radiant essence of identity through a delicate interplay of light and shadow, celebrating the transformative power of art.

name: Vibrance
description: 'Vibrance' is a dynamic celebration of color and form, reflecting the diverse energy and creativity within the queer community.

name: Ethereal
description: 'Ethereal' evokes a sense of otherworldly beauty and introspection, crafted with a sensitive touch that highlights the tender aspects of identity.

name: Continuum
description: 'Continuum' symbolizes the endless journey of transformation. Its bold lines and resilient form express strength in the evolution of identity.

name: Solstice
description: 'Solstice' captures the rhythm of change and the beauty of balance. Its enduring form reflects the interplay between light and darkness, honoring moments of transformation.
